name: Control
description: Teams fight to capture and hold a single objective. Best-of-three rounds.

name: Escort
description: Attackers escort a payload to its destination while defenders try to stop them.

name: Hybrid
description: Attackers first capture a point, then escort a payload on the next segment.

name: Push
description: Both teams vie to push a robot into the enemy base across multiple rounds.

name: Flashpoint
description: Like Control but faster points on the same map.
